title: Eater of Souls
summaries: The Eater of Souls is a flying enemy found prominently in The Corruption. It is the Corruption counterpart to the Crimson's Crimera. Eaters of Souls spawn from both Ebonstone and Corrupt grass, with large groups coming from chasms. They circle the player at a distance before periodically rushing in. There are three size variants, each with corresponding amounts of health, defense, and damage.

The Eater of Souls is the primary reason that newer players will want to avoid The Corruption prior to becoming more familiar with game combat, and acquiring more powerful <linked>weapons</linked> and <linked>armor</linked>. Eaters have relatively high defense and health points, cause significant damage on contact, and usually attack in swarms.
A fourth Eater-type enemy, the <linked>Corruptor</linked>, appears after entering <linked>Hardmode</linked>, and is larger than the large-size Eater.
